data.detailed_description:
Now you can read "Shantalia and Corali'hulu" on your cellphone, tablet or e-reader with this DLC! (FRENCH ONLY)
1 EPUB file, no DRM.
data.about_the_game:
Now you can read "Shantalia and Corali'hulu" on your cellphone, tablet or e-reader with this DLC! (FRENCH ONLY)

data.short_description: This DLC offer you the ebook 18+ version of "Shantalia and Corali'hulu" (FRENCH ONLY)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or later
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.6 or higher
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: x86 or compatible
  • Processor: 1.2 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280x720
  • Storage: 2 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
